thread.title: Ground News - Operation New Uniform helps active-duty servicemembers transition into new careers
thread.title_full: Ground News - Operation New Uniform helps active-duty servicemembers transition into new careers

author: Ground News
title: Ground News - Operation New Uniform helps active-duty servicemembers transition into new careers
text:
Summary by Ground News Operation New Uniform was founded in 2013 to help transitioning servicemembers find their "new uniform," their new career in the business world. The Jacksonville-based company, Swisher, committed $50,000 to sponsor the training of 14 Jacksonville-area military members. The Veterans of Valor Employee Resource Group will launch in 2023.
